messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] shinsengumimb.com live chat activated
messages.msgSnippet: ... Not KIND is not the word for it. Yahoo was more like downright CRUEL. Just before I was talking to you, someone else tried to chat with me on that and the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/13/2004 8:37:35 PM Eastern Daylight Time, spiritus_saitou@... writes:

> Said combatants have had it out and the dust has settled (we took it to yahoo chat, which wasn't kind to MissB last night). I've used the ez-board chat on other mb's and it works
> well. Good way to have a group chat that's easy to access.
>
> phil

Not KIND is not the word for it. Yahoo was more like downright CRUEL. Just before I was talking to you, someone else tried to chat with me on that and the same thing happened. So now I know, DON'T TOUCH ANYTHING!

I'm still going round and round with that interesting little twist you gave me Phil! I think I'm close to a solution though! Must do more research!

-MissBehavin

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] shinsengumimb.com live chat activated
messages.msgSnippet: Said combatants have had it out and the dust has settled (we took it to yahoo chat, which wasn t kind to MissB last night).  I ve used the ez-board chat on
messages.messageBody:
Said combatants have had it out and the dust has settled (we took it to yahoo chat, which wasn't kind to MissB last night). I've used the ez-board chat on other mb's and it works well. Good way to have a group chat that's easy to access.

phil

secretary <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:
initially, I felt that we didn't need the live chat feature at
ezboard...however I just read how 2 fanfic writers are fighting over
Hijikata (again)...
if you are a member on that board then all you do is click on "Live
Chat" beneath the banner
live chat works...pretty slick format...now everyone can speculate on
how hist. Hijikata managed to end rumors about Shinsengumi ghosts
courtesy of momoiro-usagi
http://p076.ezboard.com/fshinsengumiheadquartersfrm40.showMessage?topicID=1.topic
